div.head: Report for 30-01-816
div.p: The C-terminal PASTA domain of the Ser/Thr kinasez Stk1 from S. aureus was overexpressed and purified. Crystal hits were obtained for the conditions 65 (0.1 M imidazole, pH 7.5, 1.6 M zinc sulfate) and 66 (0.1 M imidazole, pH 7.5, 0.8 M zinc sulfate) of the "Cations suite" from Nextal (Qiagen). Crystals grew to dimensions of 0.1 × 0.05 × 0.05 mm 3 within 1 week. Initial X-ray diffraction data sets were collected at 100 K in-house. They belong to the tetragonal space group P4 1 22 with unit-cell parameters a=68.0 Å, b=68.0 Å, c=158.1 Å. The asymmetric unit contains one molecule with a V M values of 3.5 Å 3 .Da -1 .

Crystal soakings were performed with heavy atom salts (Au, Pt, Hg, Pb) and MAD data were collected at the tunable ESRF MX-beamline FIP-BM30. MAD data were also collected for the zinc K absorption edge. The programs XDS was used for all data processing. Data phasing was successfully achieved for a MAD data set collected from one of our best diffracting crystal (3.0 Å resolution) at the zinc K absorption edge (Table 1). Crystallization paper is published (1) and structure determination is in progress.

div.head: MAD data collected at the Zn K edge
Peak
div.p: Total oscillation range (°) 180 180 90 No. observations 106557 106374 53867 No. unique reflections 13957 13982 12810 Completeness of data (%) 99.8 (100.0) 99.8 (100.0) 91.9 (94.2) <I/σ(I)> 18.4 (4.8) 25.1 (9.8) 15.5 (4.1) Redundancy 7.6 7.6 4.2 R merge † (%) 9.3 (43.7) 6.2 (20.3) 7.1 (37.1) Values in parentheses are for the highest resolution shell. †R merge = Σ hkl Σ i |I i (hkl) -<I(hkl)>| / Σ hkl Σ i |I i (hkl)|where I i is the i th measurement of reflection I(hkl) 1. Paracuellos P, Ballandras A, Robert X, Cozzone AJ, Duclos B, Gouet P. (2009). Acta Crystallogr Sect F. 65:1187-9.
